variable.name: SHAREID
variable.description: WHI SHARe ID

variable.name: F60VTYP
variable.description: F60 Visit type

variable.name: F60VY
variable.description: F60 Visit year
variable.comment: Visit year for which this form was collected.

variable.name: F60DAYS
variable.description: F60 Days since randomization/enrollment

variable.name: STATUS
variable.description: Analysis exclusion consideration status
variable.comment: May want to consider excluding participants with a status of 1 or 2 from analyses. The FFQ is suspect in light of the very low or very high value for the Energy (kcal) result.
variable.value: Energy < 600 kcal consider excluding from analyses
Energy > 5000 kcal consider excluding from analyses

variable.name: CHICKEN
variable.description: Q1: Chicken or turkey in last 3 months
variable.comment: Did you eat chicken or turkey during the last three months?

variable.name: SKIN
variable.description: Q1.1: Ate skin with chicken or turkey
variable.comment: When you ate chicken or turkey, how often did you eat the skin? Sub-question of Q1 'Eat chicken or turkey during last 3 months' (skip pattern rule not applied).

variable.name: LITEDARK
variable.description: Q1.2: Light/Dark meat chicken or turkey
variable.comment: When you ate chicken or turkey, did you usually choose light or dark meat? Sub-question of Q1 'Eat chicken or turkey during last 3 months' (skip pattern rule not applied).

variable.name: BEEF
variable.description: Q2: Beef, pork or lamb in last 3 months
variable.comment: Did you eat beef, pork, or lamb during the last three months?

variable.name: BEEFFAT
variable.description: Q2.1: Ate fat with beef, pork or lamb
variable.comment: When ate beef, pork, or lamb, how often did you eat the fat? Sub-question of Q2 'Eat beef, pork, or lamb during last 3 months' (skip pattern rule not applied).

variable.name: HAMBURG
variable.description: Q3: Hamburger or ground meat last 3 mths
variable.comment: Did you eat hamburger or other ground meat during last three months?

variable.name: BURGLEAN
variable.description: Q3.1: Leanness of ground meat
variable.comment: When you ate hamburger or ground meat what type was it usually? Sub-question of Q3 'Eat hamburger or ground meat during last 3 months' (skip pattern rule not applied).

variable.name: CANTUNA
variable.description: Q4: Canned tuna in last 3 months
variable.comment: Did you eat canned tuna during the last three months?

variable.name: TUNAPACK
variable.description: Q4.1: Canned tuna packed in water/oil
variable.comment: When you ate canned tuna how was it usually packed? Sub-question of Q4 'Eat canned tuna during last 3 months' (skip pattern rule not applied).

variable.name: TUNAPLN
variable.description: Q4.2.1: Canned tuna prepared plain
variable.comment: When you ate canned tuna was it usually prepared plain? Sub-question of Q4 'Eat canned tuna during last 3 months' (skip pattern rule not applied).

variable.name: TUNAMAYO
variable.description: Q4.2.2: Canned tuna prepared w/mayo
variable.comment: When you ate canned tuna was it usually prepared as tuna salad with mayonnaise? Sub-question of Q4 'Eat canned tuna during last 3 months' (skip pattern rule not applied).

variable.name: TUNACASS
variable.description: Q4.2.3: Canned tuna noodle casserole
variable.comment: When you ate canned tuna was it usually prepared as tuna noodle casserole? Sub-question of Q4 'Eat canned tuna during last 3 months' (skip pattern rule not applied).

variable.name: MILK
variable.description: Q5: Drink Milk
variable.comment: Did you drink milk or milk beverages made with milk, such as hot chocolate, during the last three months? (Do not include milk used on cereal or in coffee or tea.)

variable.name: MILKFAT
variable.description: Q5.1: Fat in drinking milk
variable.comment: When you drank milk or milk beverages, what type was it usually? Sub-question of Q5 'Drink milk or milk beverages during last 3 months' (skip pattern rule not applied).

variable.name: MILKCER
variable.description: Q6: Use milk, cream or creamer on cereal
variable.comment: Did you use milk, cream, or creamer on cereal during the last three months?

variable.name: MLKCRM
variable.description: Q6.1.1: Cream or half and half on cereal
variable.comment: When you used milk, cream, or creamer on cereal did you usually use cream or half and half? Sub-question of Q6 'Use milk or cream on cereal during last 3 months' (skip pattern rule not applied).

variable.name: MLKWHOL
variable.description: Q6.1.2: Whole milk on cereal
variable.comment: When you used milk, cream, or creamer on cereal did you usually use whole milk? Sub-question of Q6 'Use milk or cream on cereal during last 3 months' (skip pattern rule not applied).

variable.name: MLK2
variable.description: Q6.1.3: 2% milk on cereal
variable.comment: When you used milk, cream, or creamer on cereal did you usually use 2% milk? Sub-question of Q6 'Use milk or cream on cereal during last 3 months' (skip pattern rule not applied).

variable.name: MLK1
variable.description: Q6.1.4: 1% milk on cereal
variable.comment: When you used milk, cream, or creamer on cereal did you usually use 1% milk? Sub-question of Q6 'Use milk or cream on cereal during last 3 months' (skip pattern rule not applied).

variable.name: MLKSKIM
variable.description: Q6.1.5: Non-fat milk on cereal
variable.comment: When you used milk, cream, or creamer on cereal did you usually use non-fat or skim milk? Sub-question of Q6 'Use milk or cream on cereal during last 3 months' (skip pattern rule not applied).

variable.name: MLKEVAP
variable.description: Q6.1.6: Evaporated or condensed milk on cereal
variable.comment: When you used milk, cream, or creamer on cereal did you usually use evaporated or condensed milk? Sub-question of Q6 'Use milk or cream on cereal during last 3 months' (skip pattern rule not applied).

variable.name: MLKSOY
variable.description: Q6.1.7: Soy milk on cereal
variable.comment: When you used milk, cream, or creamer on cereal did you usually use soy milk? Sub-question of Q6 'Use milk or cream on cereal during last 3 months' (skip pattern rule not applied).

variable.name: MLKNDCRM
variable.description: Q6.1.8: Non-dairy creamer on cereal
variable.comment: When you used milk, cream, or creamer on cereal did you usually use non-dairy creamer? Sub-question of Q6 'Use milk or cream on cereal during last 3 months' (skip pattern rule not applied).

variable.name: MLKDK
variable.description: Q6.1.9: Don't know milk on cereal
variable.comment: When you used milk, cream, or creamer on cereal you don't know what you usually used? Sub-question of Q6 'Use milk or cream on cereal during last 3 months' (skip pattern rule not applied).

variable.name: MLKCOFFE
variable.description: Q7: Use milk, cream or creamer in coffee/tea
variable.comment: Did you use milk, cream, or creamer in coffee or tea during the last three months?

variable.name: MLKCCRM
variable.description: Q7.1.1: Cream or half and half in coffee/tea
variable.comment: When you used milk, cream, or creamer in coffee or tea, did you usually use cream or half and half? Sub-question of Q7 'Use milk/cream in coffee/tea during last 3 months' (skip pattern rule not applied).

variable.name: MLKCWHOL
variable.description: Q7.1.2: Whole milk in coffee/tea
variable.comment: When you used milk, cream, or creamer in coffee or tea, did you usually use whole milk? Sub-question of Q7 'Use milk/cream in coffee/tea during last 3 months' (skip pattern rule not applied).

variable.name: MLKC2
variable.description: Q7.1.3: 2% milk in coffee/tea
variable.comment: When you used milk, cream, or creamer in coffee or tea, did you usually use 2% milk? Sub-question of Q7 'Use milk/cream in coffee/tea during last 3 months' (skip pattern rule not applied).

variable.name: MLKC1
variable.description: Q7.1.4: 1% milk in coffee/tea
variable.comment: When you used milk, cream, or creamer in coffee or tea, did you usually use 1% milk? Sub-question of Q7 'Use milk/cream in coffee/tea during last 3 months' (skip pattern rule not applied).

variable.name: MLKCSKIM
variable.description: Q7.1.5: Non-fat milk in coffee/tea
variable.comment: When you used milk, cream, or creamer in coffee or tea, did you usually use non-fat or skim milk? Sub-question of Q7 'Use milk/cream in coffee/tea during last 3 months' (skip pattern rule not applied).

variable.name: MLKCEVAP
variable.description: Q7.1.6: Evap or condensed milk in coffee/tea
variable.comment: When you used milk, cream, or creamer in coffee or tea, did you usually use evaporated or condensed milk? Sub-question of Q7 'Use milk/cream in coffee/tea during last 3 months' (skip pattern rule not applied).

variable.name: MLKCSOY
variable.description: Q7.1.7: Soy milk in coffee/tea
variable.comment: When you used milk, cream, or creamer in coffee or tea, did you usually use soy milk? Sub-question of Q7 'Use milk/cream in coffee/tea during last 3 months' (skip pattern rule not applied).

variable.name: MLKCNDCR
variable.description: Q7.1.8: Non-dairy creamer in coffee/tea
variable.comment: When you used milk, cream, or creamer in coffee or tea, did you usually use non-dairy creamer? Sub-question of Q7 'Use milk/cream in coffee/tea during last 3 months' (skip pattern rule not applied).

variable.name: MLKCDK
variable.description: Q7.1.9: Don't know milk in coffee/tea
variable.comment: When you used milk, cream, or creamer in coffee or tea you don't know what you usually used? Sub-question of Q7 'Use milk/cream in coffee/tea during last 3 months' (skip pattern rule not applied).

variable.name: COLDCER
variable.description: Q8: Cold cereal in last 3 months
variable.comment: Did you eat cold cereals during the last three months?

variable.name: CCGRAN
variable.description: Q8.1.1: Cold cereal--granola
variable.comment: When you ate cold cereals did you usually eat granola cereals? Sub-question of Q8 'Eat cold cereals during last 3 months' (skip pattern rule not applied).

variable.name: CCHIFIB
variable.description: Q8.1.2: Cold cereal--High-fiber
variable.comment: When you ate cold cereals did you usually eat high-fiber or bran cereals, such as FiberOne, Raisin Bran? Sub-question of Q8 'Eat cold cereals during last 3 months' (skip pattern rule not applied).

variable.name: CCWHOLGR
variable.description: Q8.1.3: Cold cereal--Whole grain
variable.comment: When you ate cold cereals did you usually eat whole grain cereals such as Cheerios, Shredded Wheat? Sub-question of Q8 'Eat cold cereals during last 3 months' (skip pattern rule not applied).

variable.name: CCFORTIF
variable.description: Q8.1.4: Cold cereal--Fortified
variable.comment: When you ate cold cereals did you usually eat fortified cereals such as Total, Product 19? Sub-question of Q8 'Eat cold cereals during last 3 months' (skip pattern rule not applied).

variable.name: CCOTHR
variable.description: Q8.1.5: Cold cereal--other
variable.comment: When you ate cold cereals did you usually eat other cereals such as corn flakes, Frosted Flakes? Sub-question of Q8 'Eat cold cereals during last 3 months' (skip pattern rule not applied).

variable.name: SQUASH
variable.description: Q9: Okra, squash or yams in last 3 months
variable.comment: Did you eat okra, squash, or yams during the last three months

variable.name: SQSHFRY
variable.description: Q9.1: Fried okra, squash or yams
variable.comment: When you ate okra, squash or yams, how often were they fried? (Do not include potatoes.) Sub-question of Q9 'Eat okra, squash, or yams during last 3 months' (skip pattern rule not applied).

variable.name: FRYSMARG
variable.description: Q10.1: Stick margarine used to fry foods
variable.comment: Did you usually use stick margarine to deep fry, pan fry, or saute foods?

variable.name: FRYTMARG
variable.description: Q10.2: Tub margarine used to fry foods
variable.comment: Did you usually use tub margarine to deep fry, pan fry, or saute foods?

variable.name: FRYBUTT
variable.description: Q10.3: Butter used to fry foods
variable.comment: Did you usually use butter to deep fry, pan fry, or saute foods?

variable.name: FRYSHORT
variable.description: Q10.4: Shortening used to fry foods
variable.comment: Did you usually use shortening (Crisco, lard, bacon fat or drippings, salt pork, ham hock) to deep fry, pan fry, or saute foods?

variable.name: FRYOLIV
variable.description: Q10.5: Olive or canola oil used to fry foods
variable.comment: Did you usually use olive or canola oil to deep fry, pan fry, or saute foods?

variable.name: FRYOIL
variable.description: Q10.6: Other oils used to fry foods
variable.comment: Did you usually use other oils (vegetable, corn, peanut, safflower) to deep fry, pan fry, or saute foods?

variable.name: FRYPAM
variable.description: Q10.7: Non-stick spray used to fry foods
variable.comment: Did you usually use non-stick spray (Pam) to deep fry, pan fry, or saute foods?

variable.name: FRYNOFAT
variable.description: Q10.8: No fat added to fry foods
variable.comment: Did you usually not add fat to deep fry, pan fry, or saute foods?

variable.name: LMARGC
variable.description: Q11.1: Low-cal/fat margarine used to cook foods
variable.comment: Did you usually add low calorie or low fat margarine when cooking beans, rice, vegetables and potatoes?

variable.name: SMARGC
variable.description: Q11.2: Stick margarine used to cook foods
variable.comment: Did you usually add stick margarine when cooking beans, rice, vegetables and potatoes?

variable.comment: Did you usually add tub margarine when cooking beans, rice, vegetables and potatoes?

variable.comment: Did you usually add butter when cooking beans, rice, vegetables and potatoes?

variable.comment: Did you usually add shortening (Crisco, lard, bacon fat or drippings, salt pork, ham hock) when cooking beans, rice, vegetables and potatoes?

variable.name: OLIVC
variable.description: Q11.6: Olive or canola oil used to cook foods
variable.comment: Did you usually add olive or canola oil when cooking beans, rice, vegetables and potatoes?

variable.name: OILC

variable.comment: Did you usually add other oils (vegetable, corn, peanut, safflower) when cooking beans, rice, vegetables and potatoes?

variable.name: PAMC
variable.description: Q11.8: Non-stick spray used to cook foods
variable.comment: Did you usually add non-stick spary (Pam) when cooking beans, rice, vegetables and potatoes?

variable.name: NOFATC
variable.description: Q11.9: Non-fat or No fat added to cook foods
variable.comment: Did you usually not add fat when cooking beans, rice, vegetables and potatoes?

variable.name: LMARGA
variable.description: Q12.1: Low-cal/fat marg added after cooking
variable.comment: Did you usually add low calorie or low fat margarine after cooking beans, rice, vegetables and potatoes?

variable.name: SMARGA
variable.description: Q12.2: Stick margarine added after cooking
variable.comment: Did you usually add stick margarine after cooking beans, rice, vegetables and potatoes?

variable.name: TMARGA
variable.description: Q12.3: Tub margarine added after cooking
variable.comment: Did you usually add tub margarine after cooking beans, rice, vegetables and potatoes?

variable.name: BUTTA
variable.description: 'Q12.4: Butter added after cooking
variable.comment: Did you usually add butter after cooking beans, rice, vegetables and potatoes?

variable.name: SOURCRMA
variable.description: Q12.5: Sour cream added after cooking
variable.comment: Did you usually add sour cream after cooking beans, rice, vegetables and potatoes?

variable.name: OLIVA
variable.description: Q12.6: Olive or canola oil added after cooking
variable.comment: Did you usually add olive or canola oil after cooking beans, rice, vegetables and potatoes?

variable.name: OILA
variable.description: Q12.7: Other oil added after cooking
variable.comment: Did you usually add other oils (vegetable, corn, peanut, safflower) after cooking beans, rice, vegetables and potatoes?

variable.name: NOFATA
variable.description: Q12.8: Non-fat or no fat added after cooking
variable.comment: Did you usually add non-fat margarine or not add fat after cooking beans, rice, vegetables and potatoes?

variable.name: LMARGS
variable.description: Q13.1: Low-cal/fat margarine spread on breads
variable.comment: Did you usually use low calorie or low fat margarine on breads, muffins, tortillas and rolls?

variable.name: SMARGS
variable.description: Q13.2: Stick margarine spread on breads
variable.comment: Did you usually use stick margarine on breads, muffins, tortillas and rolls?

variable.name: TMARGS

variable.comment: Did you usually use tub margarine on breads, muffins, tortillas and rolls?

variable.name: BUTTS
variable.description: Q13.4: Butter spread on breads
variable.comment: Did you usually use butter on breads, muffins, tortillas and rolls?

variable.name: OLIVS
variable.description: Q13.5: Olive or canola oil spread on breads
variable.comment: Did you usually use olive or canola oil on breads, muffins, tortillas and rolls?

variable.name: OILS
variable.description: Q13.6: Other oil spread on breads
variable.comment: Did you usually use other oils (vegetable, corn, peanut, safflower) on breads, muffins, tortillas and rolls?

variable.name: NOFATS
variable.description: Q13.7: Non-fat or no fat spread on breads
variable.comment: Did you usually use non-fat margarine or did not use fat on breads, muffins, tortillas and rolls?

variable.name: TORTILLA
variable.description: Q14: Made own tortillas in last 3 months
variable.comment: Did you make your own tortillas during the last three months?

variable.name: TORTFAT
variable.description: Q14.1: Fat used when making tortillas
variable.comment: When you made tortillas, did you make them with lard, shortening, or other fat? Sub-question of Q14 'Did you make tortillas during last 3 months' (skip pattern rule not applied).

variable.name: SALADRES
variable.description: Q15: Type of salad dressing usually use
variable.comment: What type of salad dressing did you usually use?

variable.name: MAYO
variable.description: Q16: Type of mayonnaise usually use
variable.comment: What type of mayonnaise did you usually use?

variable.name: POPCORN
variable.description: Q17: Ate popcorn in last 3 months
variable.comment: Did you eat popcorn during the last three months?

variable.name: POPCTYP
variable.description: Q17.1: Type of popcorn usually eat
variable.comment: What type of popcorn did you usually eat? Sub-question of Q17 'Eat popcorn during last 3 months' (skip pattern rule not applied).
variable.value: Popped in oil, pre-popped, or at movies

variable.name: POPCFAT
variable.description: Q17.2: Fat added to popcorn
variable.comment: When you ate popcorn, how often did you add butter or margarine? Sub-question of Q17 'Eat popcorn during last 3 months' (skip pattern rule not applied).

variable.name: COOKIE
variable.description: Q18: Ate cookies in last 3 months
variable.comment: Did you eat cookies during the last three months?

variable.name: COOKITYP
variable.description: Q18.1: Low-fat cookies
variable.comment: When you ate cookies, how often were they graham crackers, vanilla wafers, fig bars, or special low-fat or no-fat cookies? Sub-question of Q18 'Eat cookies during the last 3 months' (skip pattern rule not applied).

variable.name: CAKE
variable.description: Q19: Ate cakes/pastries in last 3 months
variable.comment: Did you eat cakes or other pastries during the last three months?

variable.name: CAKETYP
variable.description: Q19.1: Low-fat cakes/pastries
variable.comment: When you ate cakes or other pastries, how often were they angel food cakes, sponge cakes, or special low fat or no fat cakes or pastries? Sub-question of Q19 'Eat cakes or other pastries during last 3 months' (skip pattern rule not applied).
